section:
\section{WKB approximation for $\langle \varphi^2 \rangle$ and
$\langle T^{\mu}_{\nu} \rangle$ of a very massive field}

\section*{Acknowledgments}
%--------------------------------------------------------------------

I would like to thank S. V. Sushkov and N. R. Khusnutdinov for
helpful discussions. This work was supported by the Russian
Foundation for Basic Research Grant No. 02-02-17177 and by the
SRPED Foundation of Tatarstan Republic Grant No. 06-6.5-110.

%--------------------------------------------------------------------
\section*{Appendix A}

\setcounter{equation}{0}

%--------------------------------------------------------------------
To calculate the quantities $S^k_n(\varepsilon, u_0)$ it is
necessary to compute the various sums over $l$. We start from the
sum in expression (\ref{36}):
      \begin{eqnarray} \label{sun} S(u, n)=
      \sum \limits_{l=0}^{\infty}  \left\{\frac{\left(l+\frac12
      \right)^{2n+1}}{[u^2+\left(l+1/2\right)^2]^{(2n-1)/2}}
      -\left(l+\frac12 \right)^2+(2n-1)\frac{u^2}{2} \right\},
       \quad n \geq 0.
      \end{eqnarray}
For calculation of this sum we can use the Abel-Plana method
\cite{Evg,Sushkov2,P}
      \begin{equation}
      \sum \limits_{l=0}^{\infty} F( l+1/2)
      =\int \nolimits_{q}^{\infty}F(x)dx
      +\int \nolimits_{q-i\infty}^{q}\frac{F(z)}{1+e^{i2\pi z}}dz
      -\int \nolimits_{q}^{q+i\infty}\frac{F(z)}{1+e^{-i2\pi z}}dz,
      \end{equation}
where $-1/2<q<1/2$, $f(z)$ is a holomorphic function for $Re z\geq
q$, $f(z)$ satisfies the condition
      \begin{equation} \label{1}
      \left| F(x+iy) \right|<\epsilon(x)e^{a|y|}, \quad 0<a<2\pi,
      \end{equation}
and $\epsilon(x)$ is an arbitrary function with asymptotic
behavior
      \begin{equation}
      \epsilon(x)\rightarrow 0 \quad \mbox{for} \quad x
      \rightarrow +\infty.
      \end{equation}
Using this formula we can calculate the sum (\ref{sun}):
      \begin{eqnarray} \label{p1}
      S(u, n)&=&\lim _{q \rightarrow +0}\left\{
       \int\nolimits_{q}^{\infty}\left[\frac{x^{2n+1}}
       {(u^2+x^2)^{(2n-1)/2}}-x^2+(2n-1)\frac{u^2}{2}\right]dx
       \right. \nonumber \\ && \left.+\int \nolimits_{q-i\infty}^{q}
       \left[ \frac{z^{2n+1}}{(u^2+z^2)^{(2n-1)/2}}
      -z^2+(2n-1)\frac{u^2}{2}\right]\frac{dz}
      {(1+e^{i2\pi z})} \right. \nonumber \\ && \left.
      -\int \nolimits_{q}^{q+i\infty}\left[\frac{z^{2n+1}}
      {(u^2+z^2)^{(2n-1)/2}}-z^2+(2n-1)\frac{u^2}{2}\right]
      \frac{dz}{(1+e^{-i2\pi z})}  \right\} \nonumber \\ &&
      =\frac{(2n-1)}{3}\frac{(2n)!! \ u^3}{(2n-1)!!}
      +2(-1)^m \lim_{\delta \rightarrow +0} \left[
      \int \nolimits_{0}^{u+\delta}\frac{x ^{2n+1}dx}
      {(u^2-x^2)^{(2n-1)/2}(1+e^{2\pi x})}\right. \nonumber \\ && \left.
      -\left( { \mbox{\small {terms of this integral that}}
      \atop\mbox{\small{diverge in the limit}} \ \delta \rightarrow +0}
      \right)\right]\nonumber \\ &&
      =\frac{(2n-1)\ u^3}{(2n-1)!!}\left\{\frac{(2n)!!}{3}
      -2\left(\frac{d}{u d u}\right)^n
      \left[u^{2n} \int \nolimits_{0}^{1}\frac{y \sqrt{1-y^2} dy}
      {1+e^{2\pi u y}} \right]\right\} \hspace{2cm} (n \geq 0).
      \end{eqnarray}
The sum in expression (\ref{37}) can be calculated by the
differentiation of $S(u,n)$:
      \begin{eqnarray} \label{sunn}
      &&\sum \limits_{l=0}^{\infty}  \left\{\frac{\left(l+\frac12
      \right)^{2n+1}}{[u^2+\left(l+1/2\right)^2]^{(2n+1)/2}}
      -1 \right\}=\frac{-1}{(2n-1)}\left(\frac{d}{u du}\right) S(u, n)
      \nonumber \\ && =-\frac{(2n)!! \ u}{(2n-1)!!} +\frac{2}{(2n-1)!!}
      \left(\frac{d}{u d u}\right)\left\{u^3
      \left(\frac{d}{u d u}\right)^n
      \left[u^{2n} \int \nolimits_{0}^{1}\frac{y \sqrt{1-y^2} dy}
      {1+e^{2\pi u y}} \right]
       \right\} \hspace{2cm} (n \geq 0).
      \end{eqnarray}
The other sums in the expression for $S_n^k(\varepsilon, u_0)$
[Eq. (\ref{intsums})] can also be calculated by the
differentiation of $S(u,n)$:
      \begin{eqnarray} \label{sukn}
      &&\sum \limits_{l=0}^{\infty} \frac{\left(l+\frac12
      \right)^{2n+1}}{[u^2+\left(l+1/2\right)^2]^{(2n+2k+3)/2}}
      =\frac{(-1)^k (2n-1)!!}{(2n-1)(2n+2k+1)!!}
      \left(\frac{d}{u du}\right)^{k+2} S(u, n)\nonumber \\ &&
      =-\frac{(2n)!!}{(2n+2k+1)!!}\frac{(2k-1)!!}{u^{2k+1}}
      \nonumber \\ && -\frac{2 (-1)^k}{(2n+2k+1)!!}
      \left(\frac{d}{u d u}\right)^{k+2}\left\{u^3
      \left(\frac{d}{u d u}\right)^n
      \left[u^{2n} \int \nolimits_{0}^{1}\frac{y \sqrt{1-y^2} dy}
      {1+e^{2\pi u y}} \right]
       \right\} \hspace{2.3cm} \left(n \geq 0, \atop k \geq 0 \right).
      \end{eqnarray}
The integral over $y$ in all these expressions can be calculated
approximately. In this integral the integrand decreases
exponentially for $y > 1/(2 \pi u)$. The parameter $u$ in all
expressions (\ref{intsums}) satisfies the condition $u > u_0 \gg
1$. Therefore the main contribution to this integral gives a small
value of $y$ ($y \ll 1$) and the square root in the integrand can
be expanded. Then the up limit can be gone to infinity:
      \begin{eqnarray}
      \int \nolimits_{0}^{1}\frac{y \sqrt{1-y^2} dy}
      {1+e^{2\pi u y}}&=&\int \nolimits_{0}^{\infty}\frac{y  dy}
      {1+e^{2\pi u y}}\left[1-\frac{y^2}{2}-\frac{1!!}{4!!}y^4
      -\frac{3!!}{6!!}y^6+O(y^{8})\right]
      \nonumber \\ && =\frac{1}{48u^2}-\frac{7}{3840u^4}-\frac{31}{129024u^6}
      +O\left(\frac{1}{u^{10}} \right).
      \end{eqnarray}
Substituting this expression into Eqs. (\ref{p1})-(\ref{sukn}) and
integrating in Eq. (\ref{intsums}) we obtain the resulting
expressions (\ref{start})-(\ref{finish}).

      \begin{eqnarray}
      \left(T^{\rho}_{\rho} \right)_{\!(4)}&=&

+\left[-720 m^4 r^8 f^4

\right] \ln\left|\frac{4 u_0^2}{m_{ \mbox{\tiny \sl DS}}^2 r^2 }\right|

      \begin{eqnarray}
      \left(T^{\theta}_{\theta} \right)_{\!(4)}&=&

      +10080 r^6 f^2 {f'} f'' {(r^2)'}\right] \left(\xi-1/6 \right)^2
      \right. \nonumber \\ && \left.
+\left[-240 r^6 f^2 {f'}^2
      +480 r^6 f^3 f''
+\left(-720 r^4 f^4 {(r^2)'}^2
      -1440 r^8 f^3 f''
      +720 r^8 f^2 {f'}^2 \right. \right. \right. \nonumber \\ &&
      \left. \left. \left.
      +1440 r^6 f^4 {(r^2)}''
      -720 r^6 f^3 {f'} {(r^2)'}\right) m^2
      -1440 r^8 f^2 f''^2
      -720 r^4 f^3 {f'} {(r^2)}'' {(r^2)'}\right. \right. \nonumber \\ && \left.
      \left.
      -1920 r^8 f^2 {f'} f'''
      +5400 r^8 f {f'}^2 f''
      -2580 r^8 {f'}^4
      +720 r^6 f^3 f'' {(r^2)}''
      +480 r^8 f^3 f''''
      \right. \right. \nonumber \\ && \left.\left.
      -2280 r^6 f^2 {f'} f'' {(r^2)'}
      +720 r^6 f^3 {(r^2)'} f'''
      -720 r^4 f^3 f'' {(r^2)'}^2
      +1440 r^6 f {f'}^3 {(r^2)'}\right. \right. \nonumber \\ && \left.
      \left.
      +480 r^2 f^3 {f'} {(r^2)'}^3
      +660 r^4 f^2 {f'}^2 {(r^2)'}^2
      -960 r^6 f^2 {f'}^2 {(r^2)}''\right] \left(\xi-1/6 \right)
       \right. \nonumber \\ && \left.
+\left[-720 r^8 f^4 m^4
      +16 r^4 f^4
      -20 r^8 f^2 {f'} f'''
      +12 f^4 {(r^2)'}^4
      -14 r^6 f^2 {f'} f'' {(r^2)'} \right. \right. \nonumber \\ && \left. \left.
      +12 r^6 f^3 {(r^2)'} f'''
      +8 r^6 f^3 f'' {(r^2)}''
      +6 r^6 f {f'}^3 {(r^2)'}
      -2 r^6 f^2 {f'}^2 {(r^2)}''
      -8 r^6 f^3 {f'} {(r^2)}''' \right. \right. \nonumber \\ && \left. \left.
      +12 r^4 f^4 {(r^2)}''^2
      -20 r^8 f^2 f''^2
      +4 r^4 f^3 {f'} {(r^2)}'' {(r^2)'}
      -8 r^4 f^3 f'' {(r^2)'}^2
      +3 r^4 f^2 {f'}^2 {(r^2)'}^2 \right. \right. \nonumber \\ && \left. \left.
      +16 r^4 f^4 {(r^2)'} {(r^2)}'''
      +52 r^8 f {f'}^2 f''
      +8 r^8 f^3 f''''
      -8 r^6 f^4 {(r^2)}''''
      -32 r^2 f^4 {(r^2)'}^2 {(r^2)}'' \right. \right. \nonumber \\ && \left. \left.
  +\left(2880 r^4 f^4
      -21 r^8 {f'}^4
      -8640 r^4 f^4 {(r^2)}''
      -4320 r^4 f^3 {f'} {(r^2)'}
      +8640 r^2 f^4 {(r^2)'}^2\right. \right. \right. \nonumber \\ && \left. \left.
      \left.
      +9360 r^6 f^2 {f'} f'' {(r^2)'}
      +7200 r^8 f^2 {f'} f'''
      -3240 r^4 f^2 {f'}^2 {(r^2)'}^2
      +5040 r^6 f^2 {f'}^2 {(r^2)}'' \right. \right. \right. \nonumber \\ && \left. \left.
      \left.
      +7020 f^4 {(r^2)'}^4
      -5400 r^2 f^3 {f'} {(r^2)'}^3
      -20880 r^2 f^4 {(r^2)'}^2 {(r^2)}''
      +11520 r^4 f^4 {(r^2)'} {(r^2)}''' \right. \right. \right. \nonumber \\ && \left. \left.
      \left.
      -16560 r^8 f {f'}^2 f''
      -5400 r^6 f {f'}^3 {(r^2)'}
      +8640 r^4 f^4 {(r^2)}''^2
      +11520 r^4 f^3 {f'} {(r^2)}'' {(r^2)'} \right. \right. \right. \nonumber \\ && \left. \left.
      \left.
      -5760 r^6 f^3 {f'} {(r^2)}'''
      -7200 r^6 f^3 f'' {(r^2)}''
      -4320 r^6 f^3 {(r^2)'} f'''
      -2880 r^8 f^3 f'''' \right. \right. \right. \nonumber \\ && \left. \left.
      \left.
      +5040 r^8 f^2 f''^2
      +5040 r^4 f^3 f'' {(r^2)'}^2
      -5760 r^6 f^4 {(r^2)}''''
      +7020 r^8 {f'}^4 \right) \left(\xi-1/6 \right)^2 \right. \right. \nonumber \\ && \left. \left.
  +\left(-720 r^4 f^4 {(r^2)'}^2
      +720 r^6 f^3 {f'} {(r^2)'}
      +1440 r^6 f^4{(r^2)}''
      +1440 r^8 f^3 f''  \right. \right. \right. \nonumber \\ && \left. \left.
      \left.
      -720 r^8 f^2 {f'}^2\right) \left(\xi-1/6 \right) m^2
      \right] \ln\left|\frac{4 u_0^2}{m_{ \mbox{\tiny \sl DS}}^2 r^2 }\right|
\right\}.
      \end{eqnarray}
